config.description: The configuration for the Apatite instance

forceThemeMode.description: Overrides the browser's preferred color scheme when theming Apatite in fallback mode

customCSS.description: Provides custom CSS to inject when theming Apatite in fallback mode

name.description: Schedule name for use in the UI

dateRangeValid.description: Date range used to determine whether the schedule is valid. Can be used to set a schedule for only a few day(s). If absent them it is assumed the schedule is always valid

reoccurrence.description: How often to repeat the schedule. E.g repeat only Monday-Friday,

type.description: Type of reoccurrence, whether daily (select days of week), monthly (select days of month), or yearly (select days of the year)
